title: The Donger Dash (Custom Gamemode) Rules!
body:
**Donger Dash Rules - 5v5 - Draft Mode - Summoner's Rift** - Permabans: Poppy _(Ignores all damage and cc)_, Shen, Pantheon, Twisted Fate, Rek'Sai _(can teleport a huge distance)_
- Summoner spell; Teleport banned. **You also may not recall after the first 15 mins**
- Players for the first 15 mins farm in their respective lanes.
- You are not allowed to damage, CC, or otherwise prevent your opposing laner from taking minions during this time.
- Once 15 mins is up, you must return to base and may buy items (speed and health are recommended)
-  After buying items, all players travel to the top lane bushes. Red/Purple (right side) in the left hand bush closest to Blue side and Blue in the right hand bush closest to Red/Purple side.
-  The two teams will then travel in opposite directions past the turrets to the opposite team's base, hugging the outside walls
- Once they reach the opposing nexus they will go around it and go back down botlane.
- If you enounter an enemy champion, you can attack them and kill them. HOWEVER...
- IMPORTANT: YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO TURN BACK, but you can attack backwards. You must always be travelling in a clockwise direction.
- When you return to your base, you may buy items and heal
- If you die, you must wait at your base and attack enemy champions that pass by. Although, you can't leave the area behind the nexus.
- After 30 mins, the player with the most laps wins, if all of one team has died before then, the other team wins.
- You cannot stay still for extended periods of time.

EDIT: Fixed up some issues
